sense.def:
Z izrazom
original
opisujemo značilnosti, ki jih je nekaj imelo takoj, ko je nastalo.

seg.quote: They will restore the house to its original state.
The original idea came from Dr Ball.
It was originally a toy factory.

sense.def:
An original
je umetnina ali dokument, ki je pristen in ni kopija.

seg.quote: The original is in the British Museum.

sense.def:
Književno ali glasbeno delo, ki je
original
, je bilo napisano pred kratkim in še ni bilo objavljeno ali izvedeno.

seg.quote: ...her first collection of short stories, some original, some reprinted.

sense.def:
Kadar človeka, njegove misli ali delo označimo kot
original
, hočemo reči, da je zelo domiselno.

seg.quote: ...a sculptor of genius and great originality.
